alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 3:22AM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Local gusts to 70 mph possible for favored locations, such as Outer Drive on the south side of Casper. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County Lower Elevations. * WHEN...From 8 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blowing snow is possible in open and exposed areas where snowpack exists.
info.instruction: Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
